Blog.post: *~11 JuLy 2004~*~SuNdAy~* wEnT tO cIvIcS CeNtRe LiBrArY tOdAy tO sTuDy.. eRm.. nOt rEaLLy sTuDy LaH jUz wRiTiNg mY cHeM PrActIcAl nOtEs LoR.. HaViNg mY sPaS sOoN.. i wEnT tO tHe LiBrArY cOs i wAnTeD tO sEe iF i cAn hElP wEiLiN iN dOiNg hIs Hw.. bUt eRr.. dUn tHiNk i hElpEd hIm.. LoLx =p cOs i DuN eVeN nOe aNyThInG.. tHiNk i jUz sUx~.. hE bOuGhT a pEaCh bLeNdEd sAyInG tT hE LiKeS pEaCh =) tHe aUnTiE cLeAr iT aWaY wHeN hE fInIshEd iT.. ThEn a gAl cAmE tO sAy tT wE'Re nOt aLLoWeD tO SiT tHeRe iF wE DiN bUy aNyThInG =s.. sO We wEnT tO bUy FrIeS aNd i BoUgHt a mOcHa bLeNdEd.. hMm.. hIs cUtE sIs n hIs dAd cAmE aT aRoUnD 6pLuS.. dIn rEaLLy LoOk aT hIs DaD tHe oThEr tImE aT hIs hOuSe dUn rEmEmBeR hOw hE LoOk LiKe.. hIs dAd dUn rEaLLy LoOk fIeRcE dUnO y wEiLiN kEeP sAyInG hIs dAd =x hIs sIs kEeP eAtInG fRiEs hAhAx.. sHe'S cUtE =) sHe cAlLeD hEr mUm sI fEi pO.. dUnO y hAhax.. tHiNk hEr mUm wIll bE qUiTe uPsEt iF sHe hEaRs tT =x .. LeFt tHe LiBrArY aT aRoUnD 7pLuS aNd wEnT tO tHe PoPuLaR.. BoUgHt a FiLe tO kEeP mY nOtEs aS sOmE nOtEs dIn pUnCh hOlE yEt.. sO mA fAn.. hAiX.. jUz fInIsHeD tYpInG mY pW sUrVeY qUeStIoNnAiRe aNd pRiNtEd iT oUt.. sIaNx~ gOt pW LeSsOn tMl.. sUrE gEt sCoLdInG oNe.. tT LeAdEr LoR.. dIn dO aNyThInG.. DoUbt hE fInD aNy iNfO aT hOmE oR tT dAy iN tHe LiBrArY =/.. oH wAtEvEr~.. GoTtA sLeEp Le~! iT's 2pLuS gOiNg tO 3!! sO LaTe nOw.. HaIx~.. BuAiX~ =x nItExNiTeX~

*~10 JuLy 2004~*SaTuRdAy~* HaD cHi LiStEnInG tOdAy.. It wAs bOrInG~ =s wEnT aT 8pLuS, HaD tO bE tHeRe bY 8.45 aNd iT sTaRtS aT 9.30!! =x tHe TeAcHeR cAmE aT 9..aNd i aCtUaLLy sLePt fRoM 9 tO 9.25.. cAnT cOnTrOl =x.. tHe mUsIc ThEy PlAy oN 92.4 iS jUz tOo rElAxInG n nIcE~ =) hMm.. It wAs qUiTe OKAY.. GoT ThE mIcROsOfT oFfIcE cDrOm fRoM LiPiNg.. wHiChS mEaNs i CaN dO mY wEbBy wIf It NoW =D hAhAx.. aNd cAn dO mY pW wOrk~ =S.. cAn PrInT mY LyRiCs~ yEaHH =D.. LoLx.. LiShI wEnT tO DaNcE HaFtA wAiT fOr hEr fOr oNe n A HaLf HrS.. DeCiDeD tO dO w/O hEr fIrSt.. oNly mE n SlYvEsTeR.. tHe LeAdeR dUnO gO wHeRe sLaCk LiAoX.. =/ hMm.. aMeNdEd n AdD StUfF iNtO oUr PrOpOsAl n SuRvEy.. LiShI's gOnNa wRiTe tHe pRopOsAl n I m GoiNg To Do tHe sUrVeY =s sLyVeStEr gOnA fInD iNfO aBt LaTeSt eDuCatIoN.. LeAdER i DUNO.. SLACK~ mAyBe(wHiCh iS pRoBaBly =x).. hMm.. HeArD tT LiShI cRiEd yEsTeRdAy bEcOs oF mE.. =s dIn rEaLLy mEaN tO dO aNyThInG Tt MaKeS hEr cRy.. BUT rEaLLy vErY aNgRy LoR.. kEeP wAiTiNg aNd wAiTiNg.. tHeN vErY hUnGrY nOe~!.. sOmEmOrE hAvEn Do mY bIo eNzYmEs.. =x hAiX~

*~8 JuLy 2004~*FrIdAy~* (....aNotHeR dAy iS gOiNg bY i'M tHiNkInG aBt u aLL tHe tImE bUt u'Re oUt tHeRe n i'M hErE wAiTiNg....) hMm.. eArLy iN tHe mOrNiNg, wAiTeD iMpaTiEnTly fOr jEsMiNe aNd jInHoNg.. hAix.. iT's a fAcT tT tHeY'vE aLwAyS bEen LaTe rEcEnTlY.. dUn mEaN tO bE sO 'AnGrY' =( jUz dUn LiKe wAiTiNg eVeRyDaY =s sOrRy gUyS~ tOdAy, mS oNg lOsT hEr vOiCe, mS LiNa tOoK OvEr.. aNd sHe rEaLLy mAkE mE fEeL LiKe sLpInG~ zZz.. sHe sPoKe LiKe iNdOnEsIAn =S i ThInK i'm GoNnA mIz mS oNg WhEn sHe's nOt hEre =x i tHiNk sHe tEaCh rEaLLy WeLL =) yEa!! tOdAy dUn hAf cHi LeSsoN bUt hAfTa fInIsH oNe eXeRcIse aNd hAnDeD uP bY tWo =x LuCkiLy i cOmPlEtE iT.. aNd wEnT oUtTa sCh, dEcIdeD tO wAtCh a mOvIe! =p sMsEd wIf wEiLiN aNd mEt hIm aFtEr sCh.. bUt hAfTa wAiT tIll hIs LeSsOn eNd.. iT's aRoUnD 4pm.. wEnT hOmE aT 3pLuS tO bAtH aNd cHaNgEd iNtO bLuE jEaNs aNd a rEd t-sHiRt bEfOrE mEeTiNg hIm =) mEt hIm aT 5 iN cWp oUtsIdE bReAdTaLk.. sAw mArTiN aNd aIsAh.. wE wEnT tO bUy tHe tIx tHeN tO bUy bReAdTaLk bEfOrE tHe mOvIe sTaRtS aT 5.30pm.. sAw hIs FrEnX wHeN wAlKiNg tOwArDs tHe eScAlAtOr aNd tHeY wAvEd aS iF i nOe tHeM LoLx.. tOo FrEnLy i ThInK.. wHeN gOiNg uP tO tHe cInEmA, sAw cLaR, mAy, YoNgJuN, ZeN n FrEn.. tHeY gOiNg tO wAtcH YJ pLay bBaLL sEmIfInAl aT hOuGaNg (sHoUlD bE =x) iT sTaRTs aT 7.. sAw jEsMiNe n StAcY iN thE cInEmA.. hMm.. dId i mEnTiOn wE wAtCHeD mEaNgIrLs? iT's qUiTe a nIcE mOvIe, fUnNy tOo =D aFtEr tT i hEaRd sImPlE PlAn's dOn't wAnNa tHiNk aBt u mTv sCrEeNiNg oN tHe bIg sCrEen =).. wEnT dOwN tHe eScAlAtOr wAnTeD tO gO hOmE bUdDeN wEnT uP aGaIn =x.. cOs hAfTA bUy dInNer hOmE.. mY sIs wAnTeD tO eAt kFc bUddY mEaL bUdDeN sHe sTiLL sLpInG~ dUh~.. sO i bOuGhT hOmE kFc tO eAt.. hAvInG fAsTfOoD tHe wHoLe DaY~ MaC iN tHe aFternoOn KfC aT nItE.. HaIx.. =S hMm.. wEiLiN WaLkEd mE tO thE iNtErcHaNge 911 bUs StOp n WaItEd fOr tHe bUs Wif mE =) hE LoOkS kInDa cUtE tOdAy.. ErM.. sHoUlD sAy eVeRyDaY n eVeRyTiMe.. LoLx =P hAd a GrEaT tImE wIf hIm.. sOuNdS LiKe a 'DaTe' hUh.. LoLx.. hMm.. aLrIgHt gOtTa sLp Le~~ iT's 1am!! nItExNiTex~ =P (....aNd i WrOtE tIs LeTtEr iN mY hEaD cOs sO mAnY tHiNgS wErE LeFt uNsAiD bUt nOw u'Re gOnE n i CaN't tHiNk sTrAiGhT....)
wEnT tO wAtCh sPiDeRmAn2!! dAmN nIcE mAN~..
